snippet.title: Leader of the Pack - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Leader of the Pack is a wildlife simulator with RPG elements. You play as a wolf trying to survive and thrive in her environment. We aimed to create a simulator as close to real thing as possible so that our players can feel the thrill of living in the wilds. Find friends and enemies among other wolves. Chase your pray and hunt for your survival. When scarcity hits, find your food in most unlikely places. Get other wolves to join you. Become the Leader of the Pack.

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2767810/Leader_of_the_Pack/

Discord channel: https://discord.com/invite/uuymw4EM

#leaderofthepack #indiegamedev #madewithunity #trailer #gameplay
